attributes.action: stop immigration from outside the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As has been demonstrated recently, there is evidence that the sheer volume of migration into britain from eastern european countries, which is something outside of the control of the UK (due to shared EU membership), means that only way to stop systems such as the NHS and schools being pushed to breaking point is to put a total stop to the immigration of peoples from outside the European Union.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
